item.title: Introducing the CloudFam Referral Program
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: We are pleased to offer to our customers this full-featured referral program, the latest addition to our expanding rewards roster.
item.content:encoded:
Our commitment to continually improving customer experience and happiness is the foundation upon which we are built.

Sadly, we have found this to be an increasingly less common attribute among companies in the modern marketplace. What’s even more unsettling, this ever lowering bar is viewed as the norm by the frustrated and disenfranchised modern consumer.

It is with this inspiration in mind that we are pleased to introduce our new full-featured CloudFam Referral Program.

Give 10, Get 10’s

  • For every person who you refer to us, we offer them $10 in store credit on your behalf.
  • For each and every person you refer to us who becomes a paying customer, we give you $10 in store credit.

Rules and restrictions

There are only two requirements:

  1. First, you must have an account, and be logged in.
  2. Second, you must be a paying customer.

Get started

To get started referring, visit the Refer a Friend page.

You can keep track of all of your referrals by clicking on the Referrals tab in the My Account section.

CloudFam Rewards

This Referral Program is only the latest addition to the ever-expanding discount roster we are proud to offer to our loyal customers.

  • 10% cash back on every dollar you spend is deposited into your account as CloudCoins, redeemable on future purchases.
  • 15% discount on every purchase for all active/retired: military, police, fire-fighters, first-responders, and EMS. If you’re one of these heroes, contact heroes at cloudchemistry [dot] co to get your discount code. You will be asked to produce ID.
  • 15% discount on every purchase for college students. If you’re a college student, contact students at cloudchemistry [dot] co to get your discount code. You will be asked to produce ID.
  • Free shipping on orders over $50.
  • 50 CloudCoins ($5) deposited to your account as soon as you sign up. (For new accounts only)

This is just the beginning. There is more coming soon.
